tool_description:
this is a data from many web site news
you cane view the date to use it in your web site
title: news-world-api

api_list.name: this request search for news_nyp
api_list.description: this API is very easy to use just copy the code in Code Snippets and put it in your project
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://news-world-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/nyp"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-world-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
